features/hear_shout.feature:
Feature: Hear Shout

  Shouts have a range of approximately 1000m

  Scenario Outline: Only in range shout is heard
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
    And Sean is at <seans-loc>
    When Sean shouts
    Then Lucy should <what-lucy-hears>
    
    Examples: In range
      | seans-loc | what-lucy-hears |
      | 0, 900    | hear Sean       |
      | 0, 800    | hear Sean       |
      | 900, 10   | hear Sean       |
      | 500, 800  | hear Sean   |

    Examples: Out of range
      | seans-loc | what-lucy-hears |
      | 800, 800  | not hear Sean   |
      | 800, 700  | not hear Sean   |

  Scenario: Out of range shout is not heard
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
    And Sean is at 800, 800
    When Sean shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear Sean

  Scenario: Multiple shouters
    Given people are locate at:
      | name  |    x |   y |
      | Lucy  |    0 |   0 |
      | Sean  |    0 | 500 |
      | Oscar | 1100 |   0 |
    When Sean shouts
    And Oscar shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear Oscar
    But Lucy should hear Sean

  Scenario: Lucy doesn't hear herself
    Given Lucy is at 0, 0
    When Lucy shouts
    Then Lucy should not hear Lucy
cyber-dojo.sh:
NODE_VERSION=8.4.0

echo JASMINE TESTS
echo =============

n use ${NODE_VERSION} /usr/local/lib/node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine \
  JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=tests/jasmine.json

# You have to cd to a specific folder because
#   ~/node_modules/cucumber/bin/cucumber.js
# contains the line
# require('../lib/cli/run.js').default();
# Go figure!

cd ~/node_modules/cucumber/bin

export NODE_PATH=/home/$CYBER_DOJO_AVATAR_NAME/node_modules

echo CUCUMBER FEATURES
echo =================

./cucumber.js \
  --format-options '{"colorsEnabled":false}' \
  --format-options '{"snippetInterface":"synchronous"}' \
  ${CYBER_DOJO_SANDBOX}/features/*.feature
